title: Improvements to Polonnaruwa General Hospital
decision_details:
- the proposal made by Hon. Maithripala Sirisena, Minister of Health, to make the following improvements to the Polonnaruwa General Hospital, was approved by the Cabinet:

		*	construction of a four storied Ward Complex	 - Rs.416.94 million.
*	construction of a three storied building 
	for the Laboratory					 - Rs.36.43 million
		*	extension of quarters for Senior House Officers  - Rs.12.17 million.
		*	extension and renovation of Senior 
			Nurses' Quarters  					 - Rs.26.89 million 
		*	renovation of quarters of Male Nurses 		 - Rs.10.32 million 
		
	The construction work will be entrusted to the Central Engineering Consultancy Bureau which is a government concern.
